body: Jesus Christ, it's still going. NTR fans sure are interesting specimens.

This isn't fair. This is literally not fair. I never insulted anybody until I started getting blasted with insults and even then, I tried not to go overboard. I went back to the begining of the thread, and yes, I am the victim here. All I did was share my findings with you all, and then everyone loses their mind because a story has, supposedly, "netorare" elements in it. No, I said it was cheating, not netorare. No, I didnt insult or troll anybody. I only insulted people who attacked me first. I'm Russia in this case. I was backed into a corner and when I got ready to lash out, the rest of the world starts pointing fingers and accusing me of starting the whole thing. But just like Moscow, I am not going to back down. I will not shut up and comply with your agreements. I will continue to speak up, and I refuse to have my lips shut because a bunch of fools who are too attached to fictional genres were offended by my revelations. -DETROID_NTR

@ageyri - I know it's you, fackfuck. I apologize if it looked like I was playing the victim card, but the truth still remains that I didn't start this conflict. I made keen observations, and a bunch of people decided to mock me for it. Even worse? They hated me for it. And all because they thought I had "discovered netorare"...No, son, it wasn't netorare; it was cheating.

@non - That's the million dollar question, isn't it? "What is our purpose?" Honestly, we have spent so much time contemplating this question that, dare I say, we might as well not even have one. I think, the truth is, that our-or rather MY-purpose is to simply live. It's strange to think about, but whenever I do, I can't imagine other people's consciousness. You ever think that maybe he was right? We probably can't die...Actually, I can't die, but in my pov, you can. But in your pov, I can but you can't. It's a scary thought process, but I can't think of anything else. We're not in a simulation, that's for sure, but I believe that we live in a sentient universe. God? No, the universe, maybe just existence itself. I suppose we will all find out once we reach our end. It's a shame, really, that we can't figure it out now, but knowledge is curse, I guess.

@ohnodonttell - Who the fuck are you a calling nigger? How does one even act? Stop, nah just stop. Don't reply, and return to jacking off to your netorare doujins that you have favourited, you fat toad.

I scaled Google for the definitive answer as to, what is netorare? I think I finally found it: I was wrong. Netorare is when the story focuses on the cheating rather than the couple being intercepted by the cheater. Netorare is also when the cheater/cucker achieves full domination over the female. More often than not, it ends with the male in the couple finding out that the woman was cheating on him, either that or it ends with the woman deciding to stay with the fucker but also with the cuck, or with the cucker recording or taking a photo of her being ducked senelessley.
